Combat
Hit Points: 140 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Club; Dagger; Dart; Improvised; Javelin; Mace; Quarterstaff; Scimitar; Sickle; Sling; Spear
Armor: Breastplate Shield: None Weapons: Scimitar (+7 1d6+1); Sling (+7 1d4+1 R30/120); Unarmed (+6 1d4)
Combat Notes:

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Tavern Brawler: Weapon Proficiency (Improvised)/Unarmed attacks inflict 1d4 HP
Fungal Body: Immune to critical hits
Halo Of Spores: R10' Use Reaction to inflict 1d10 HP necrotic (DC 16 Con neg)
Mounted Combatant: Adv on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount/May redirect attack on mount to self/Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Spreading Spores: R30' Halo Of Spores (DC 16 Con neg)
Symbiotic Entity: Expend 1 Wild Shape use to gain 80 temporary HP, 2d6 HP necrotic Halo Of Spores damage, and +1d6 HP necrotic on melee hits for 10 min or until temporary HP lost
Tavern Brawler: May use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom

Save Notes:
Full Of Stars: Starry Form gives resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Fungal Body: Immune to blinded, deafened, frightened, and poisoned conditions
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: D: 8; W: 6 Spell DC: D: 16; W: 14
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Target beast becomes convinced of self harmlessness (Wisdom neg; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 dy [+Level affects +1 target]
Animate Dead (D3 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R10' Bones or corpse of a medium or small creature becomes an obedient (R60') skeleton or zombie for 1 dy [+Level animates +2 undead]
Aura Of Life (D4 [Circle Of Wildfire] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum HP reduction and raises those w/0 HP to 1 HP for conc up to 10 min
Awaken (D5 Tran): Touched beast or plant gains Intelligence 10, speech, and movement and becomes charmed for 30 dy
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self may perceive through touched willing beast's senses for conc up to 1 hr [R]
Blight (D4 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Constitution half; plant target suffers Disadv and maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Blindness/Deafness (D2 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R30' Inflicts choice of blindness or deafness on target (Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Burning Hands (D1 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Chill Touch (D0 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Cloudkill (D5 [Circle Of Spores] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Constitution half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (D4 [Circle Of Spores] Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack an adjacent creature/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level increases radius by 5']
Conjure Animals (D3 Conj): R60' Summons 1/2/4/8 obedient CR 2/1/half/quarter fey spirits in beast form for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level doubles/triples/quadruples animal count at level 5/7/9]
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient CR 6 fey for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level CR +1]
Conjure Minor Elementals (D4 Conj): R90' Summons 1/2/4/8 obedient CR 2/1/half/quarter elementals for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level doubles/triples elemental count at level 6/8]
Contagion (D5 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): Touched becomes diseased for 7 dy after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes neg)
Cure Wounds (D1 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Feign Death (D3 Necr): Touched appears dead and gains resistance to non-psychic damage for 1 hr [R]
Find Familiar (D1 [Wild Companion] Conj): R10' Self gains service from a summoned spirit in animal form [R]
Fire Shield (D4 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): Self gains resistance to heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 connected 10' cubes inflict 7d10 HP fire (Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Flame Strike (D5 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP choice of fire or radiant]
Flaming Sphere (D2 [Circle Of Wildfire] Conj): R60' 5' sphere lights a 20' radius, inflicts 2d6 HP fire (Dexterity half), ignites unattended flammable objects, and moves 30'/rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Gaseous Form (D3 [Circle Of Spores] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc up to 1 hr
Gentle Repose (D2 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 dy [R]
Greater Restoration (D5 Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, or cursed or regains ability or HP maximum
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Guidance (D0 [Star Map] Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Guiding Bolt (D1 [Star Map] Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Gust Of Wind (D2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Strength neg), inflicts half movement, and has a 50% chance of extinguishing flames for conc up to 1 min
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+2 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Mass Cure Wounds (D5 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+2 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Plant Growth (D3 [Circle Of Wildfire] Tran): R150' Causes plants to overgrow in a 100' radius or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Polymorph (D4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg; shapechanger immune) for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; may use for a ranged spell attack inflicting 4d8 HP that ends spell
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc up to 1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R100' Items in a 50' radius fall upward for conc up to 1 min
Revivify (D3 [Circle Of Wildfire] Necr): Restores life and 1 HP to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Scorching Ray (D2 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self polymorphs for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club inflicts +8 magical attacks and 1d8+2 HP damage for 1 min
Sunburst (D8 Evoc): R150' 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP and blindness (Constitution half HP only) for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Fire (D4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20'x1' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) w/in 10' of chosen side for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Stone (D5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for conc up to 10 min
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R120' 60'x10'x5' wall inflicts 7d8 HP piercing (Dexterity half) initially plus half Speed and 7d8 HP slashing to passers (Dexterity half) for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: May use Wild Shape at will
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 W0 spells/May cast chosen W1 spell 1/long rest
Twinkling Constellations: Improve Starry Form effects to 2d8, Dragon form gives 20' fly; switch between forms 1/rd
Archdruid: Casting spells requires no verbal, somatic, or cost-free material components
Beast Spells: May cast spells during Wild Shape
Blazing Revival: R120' Extinguish Wildfire Spirit to regain 70 HP when reduced to 0 HP 1/long rest
Cauterizing Flames: R30' Create spectral flame for 1 min when creature dies; use to heal or inflict 2d10+2 HP fire on another in same space 6/long rest
Cosmic Omen: R30' Use Reaction to impose +1d6 or -1d6 on attack, ability, and saving throws 6/long rest
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Enhanced Bond: Fire spells inflict +1d8 HP fire, healing spells heal +1d8 HP, can cast through Wildfire Spirit
Fungal Infestation: R10' Use Reaction to animate creature that dies into 1 HP zombie that obeys self mental commands for 1 hr 2/long rest
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Star Map: Know Guidance cantrip, cast Guiding Bolt 6/long rest
Starry Form: Wild Shape into form of Archer (R60' ranged spell inflicts 2d8+2 HP radiant), Chalice (R30' healing spell restores 2d8+2 to another), or Dragon (minimum 10 on concentration rolls)
Summon Wildfire Spirit: R30' Expend 1 Wild Shape use to inflict 2d6 HP fire in 10' radius (DC 16 Dex neg) and summon Wildfire Spirit (AC 13, HP 105, MV/Fly 30', Attack R60' +8 inflicts 1d6+6 HP fire, Teleport targets in 5' radius) for 1 hr
Wild Companion: Expend 1 Wild Shape use to cast Find Familiar to summon fey, lasting 10 hr
Wild Shape: May transform into a CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
